item.option: The eUICC supports NIST P-256 [11] for signing and for verification (see Note 2)
The eUICC supports brainpoolP256r1 [8] for signing and for verification (see Note 2)
The eUICC supports FRP256V1 [9] for signing and for verification (see Note 2)
The eUICC supports Test Profiles
The eUICC supports CRL
The eUICC supports the LPAe
The eUICC stores the otPK.eUICC.ECKA / otSK.eUICC.ECKA from previous unsuccessful download attempt for future retry
The eUICC can hold two PIR
The Device supports LPAd
The Device supports GSM/GERAN
The Device supports UMTS/UTRAN
The Device supports cdma2000 1X
The Device supports cdma2000 HRPD
The Device supports cdma2000 eHRPD
The Device supports LTE/E-UTRAN
The Device supports NFC as defined in TS26
The Device supports eUICC CRL
Initiation of the Enable Profile procedure is allowed on a Profile that is enabled already
Initiation of the Enable Profile procedure is allowed even if the currently enabled Profile has PPR1
Device supports only cellular connectivity (see Note 1)
Device offers a user interface to enter a PIN for user authentication
Device allows the End User to initiate the disabling or deletion of an enabled Profile with ppr1
Device allows the End User to initiate the deletion of a Profile with ppr2
Initiation of the Disable Profile procedure is allowed on a Profile that is disabled already
Initiation of Disable Profile procedure is allowed even if the currently enabled Profile has PPR1
Device retries after unsuccessful CC entry attempt
The Device provides the LUI functionality to postpone Profile Download
Device supports Power-on Profile discovery
Initiation of the Enable Profile procedure is allowed only if no Profile is enabled already
The Device provides the LUI functionality to reject Profile Download
The Device supports Set/Edit Nickname procedure
SM-DP+ reuses otPK.eUICC.ECKA from previous unsuccessful download attempt
SM-DP+ supports usage of session keys (S-ENC, S-MAC) for profile protection
SM-DS is an Alternative SM-DS. NOTE: If an SM-DS is not an Alternative SM-DS then it is a Root SM-DS.

item.name: TC_eUICC_ES10b.ListNotification All test sequences except the sequence #5
TC_eUICC_ES10b.RetrieveNotificationsList All test sequences except the sequences #5 and #15
TC_eUICC_ES10b.RetrieveNotificationsList Only the test sequences #5 and #15
TC_eUICC_ES10b.RemoveNotificationFromList All test sequences except the sequence #5
TC_LPAd_ES9+_CancelSession_Nominal All test sequences except the sequence #02
SIMAlliance eUICC Profile Package Test Specification

item.condition: IF (O_E_NIST) THEN M ELSE N/A
IF (O_E_BRP) THEN M ELSE N/A
IF (O_E_FRP) THEN M ELSE N/A
IF (O_D_LPAD) THEN M ELSE N/A
IF (O_D_CC_RETRY AND NOT O_D_ONLY_CELLULAR_CONNECTIVITY) THEN M ELSE N/A
IF (NOT O_E_LPAe) THEN M ELSE N/A
IF (O_D_LPAD AND NOT O_D_ONLY_CELLULAR_CONNECTIVITY) THEN M ELSE N/A
IF (O_D_LPAD AND O_D_EU_POSTPONED AND NOT O_D_ONLY_CELLULAR_CONNECTIVITY) THEN M ELSE N/A
IF (O_D_LPAD AND O_D_PIN AND NOT O_D_ONLY_CELLULAR_CONNECTIVITY) THEN M ELSE N/A
IF (O_D_LPAD AND O_D_ENPROF AND NOT O_D_ENPROF1ST) THEN M ELSE N/A
IF (O_D_LPAD AND O_D_ENPREVPPR1 AND NOT O_D_ONLY_CELLULAR_CONNECTIVITY) THEM M ELSE N/A
IF (O_D_LPAD AND O_D_DISDELPPR1 AND NOT O_D_ONLY_CELLULAR_CONNECTIVITY) THEN M ELSE N/A
IF (O_D_LPAD AND O_D_DELPPR2 AND NOT O_D_ONLY_CELLULAR_CONNECTIVITY) THEN M ELSE N/A
IF (O_D_LPAD AND O_D_PIN AND O_D_DELPPR2 AND NOT O_D_ONLY_CELLULAR_CONNECTIVITY) THEN M ELSE N/A
IF (O_P_REUSE_OTPK) THEN M ELSE N/A
IF (NOT O_P_REUSE_OTPK) THEN M ELSE N/A
IF (O_D_LPAD AND NOT O_D_ONLY_CELLULAR_CONNECTIVITY AND O_D_DISPROF) THEN M ELSE N/A
IF (O_D_LPAD AND NOT O_D_ONLY_CELLULAR_CONNECTIVITY AND O_D_DISPPR1) THEN M ELSE N/A
IF (O_E_REUSE_OTPK) THEN M ELSE N/A
IF (NOT O_E_REUSE_OTPK) THEN M ELSE N/A
IF (O_S_ALT) THEN M ELSE N/A
IF (O_D_LPAD AND O_D_POW_ON_PROF_DISCOVERY AND NOT O_D_ONLY_CELLULAR_CONNECTIVITY) THEN M ELSE N/A
IF (O_D_LPAD AND O_D_EU_REJECT AND NOT O_D_ONLY_CELLULAR_CONNECTIVITY) THEN M ELSE N/A
IF (NOT O_S_ALT) THEN M ELSE N/A
IF (O_E_2_PIR) THEN M ELSE N/A
IF ((O_D_LPAD AND NOT O_D_ONLY_CELLULAR_CONNECTIVITY) AND (O_D_EU_POSTPONED OR O_D_EU_REJECT)) THEN M ELSE N/A
IF (O_D_LPAD AND NOT O_D_ONLY_CELLULAR_CONNECTIVITY AND O_D_NICKNAME) THEN M ELSE N/A
IF (O_P_SESSION_KEYS) THEN M ELSE N/A
IF (O_P_SESSION_KEYS AND O_P_REUSE_OTPK) THEN M ELSE N/A
IF (O_P_SESSION_KEYS AND NOT O_P_REUSE_OTPK) THEN M ELSE N/A
